alert.note: Alert for Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 31 at 3:06AM MST until January 01 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 11 AM MST SATURDAY ABOVE 6000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected above 6000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches, with 6 to 10 inches above 7000 feet. Snow showers develop by mid day with the heaviest snow expected this evening through early Saturday morning. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph producing blowing snow. * WHERE...Areas above 6000 feet near Buffalo Pass, Ganado and Window Rock. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 11 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute, and any New Year`s Eve plans. Snow forecast from 11 AM Today to 11 AM Saturday: Buffalo Pass 6 to 10 inches Ganado 4 to 6 inches Window Rock 3 to 5 inches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
